segments.text: In this kitchen drawing, everything seems routine at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult woman faces the sink, carefully drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water runs from the faucet, but the basin can't hold it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It spills over, wetting the floor and her shoes unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her side, dishes are neatly stacked on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On the left, the boy balances on the two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach into the cookie jar shows clear intent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands ready, her open palm expectant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tilt suggests instability in the moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window reveals a tidy garden path and bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains pulled back allow daylight to fill the space.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This contrast between calm outside and tension inside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overall, it's a snapshot of domestic life with hidden risks.
segments.speaker: PAR
